name: Revelation: The Beast
description:
Early in our world, Lucifer was thrown out of Heaven to rule Hell. 
Although, being one of God's sons doesn't mean you're instantly the new king. 

Help Lucifer get to the top and sit on his throne, to torture the damned for time eternal!

Note: The game is only viably played with a controller, preferably Xbox One game pads as well as PS4 ones.
